attributes.action: Right And Best For All - End Oldfield Conspiracy
attributes.additional_details: I have been put through human rights abuses, neurological problems like epilepsy and 24 years of memory problems and denied legal rights. I am looking for at least £24 million compensation, my legal and human rights restored and an apology for  what I have been put through because of this  miscarriage of justice/ illegal treatment - failing that the right to sue the government. I hope an apology will help people see what I have endured, improve relations and allow me the success I should have had.
